summary: This is a brief email exchange between two individuals, likely U.S. Attorneys, regarding a forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The initial email requests a moment to discuss the case, and a follow-up reply indicates the recipient is returning.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email exchange is about putting a forfeiture case involving Epstein on the recipient's radar.

events.title: Email about Epstein forfeiture case
events.description: An email is sent to put a forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein on the recipient's radar.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 8, 2019, discussing a forfeiture case involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is sent from a U.S. Attorney's office (USANYS) and is marked as important.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein's assets in early 2019.
